name: SuicideAttempt
title: Suicide Attempt
description: This value set has not been validated in a clinical pilot.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set lists diagnoses related to suicide attempts),(Data Element Scope: SNOMED-CT codes related to suicide behaviors (e.g., ideations, attempts).),(Inclusion Criteria: Disorder and diagnosis codes related to suicidal ideations and attempts.),(Exclusion Criteria: Disorders and diagnosis codes related to intentional self-inflicted harm (e.g., involving medications or an object such as a knife).)
